title: Babu, Baboon, Backlight (Letters Series)
description:
On episode 394 of Sleep and Relax ASMR we continue the new series that we'll just call "Letters," for the time being.  Very similar to "Double Rainbow," we go down the dictionary  in alphabetical order. For non-native English speakers it's great way to learn English on the side; for native English speakers it's the perfect mixture of boredom and education to help you fall asleep.  This episode focuses on words beginning with the letter "B." Even if you didn't catch episode one (Ability, Abroad, Abstract), there is no worries as you don't need to listen to this series in sequential order to enjoy it!
